程序包 modele

类 MapInDesk

java.lang.Object
Observer_Pattern.Observable
modele.MapInDesk
public class MapInDesk
extends Observer_Pattern.Observable

The class MapInDesk implements the interface Observable and contains a map 5*3 and provide methodes which can edit map

从以下版本开始:
15 December 2020
版本:
1.0
作者:
Wang Taojun
